decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to commencement of the work: (a) Details of the glazing pattern of the proposed conservatory Such details shall be implemented only in accordance with the drawings as approved.  REASON: To safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building, in accordance with the Adopted Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) policies 4.1, 4.6, 4.8, 5.5 and 5.9. | Detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to commencement of the work: (a) Details of the replacement windows (b) Details of the replacement window cills (c) Details of the replacement window arches (d) Details of the replacement window aprons Such details shall be implemented only in accordance with the drawings as approved.  REASON:  To safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building, in accordance with the Adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) policies 4.1, 4.6, 4.8, 5.5 and 5.9.
description: Ground floor rear conservatory extension and replacement of side and rear windowss (2 No) to kitchen.
